title: Revisiting Memories!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>It’s been a month since our live. Part of me felt like it was just a couple of days ago, but another part felt so long ago.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That may be because it was like a dream to us. We get so immersed in our lives and always give it our all that, when they end, no one can tell if it was real or not.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Even though I can remember everything.... It feels so different from my memories of hanging out with everyone. So strange.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm~.... They say that memories are strongly linked to smells, so if we smell things we smell back then, we may be able to relive them! Wanna go to my place for some okonomiyaki? Ai will do my best to make them~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Okonomiyaki....! I do. Rina-chan’s board「Drool」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, Ai will try making the same one we all had!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I want some omusoba too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Okay, anything else? Ai will make everything you want, Rinari!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Then.... Let’s see....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>You can think about it on our way there. Alright, let’s go! Time to revisit our times in Osaka~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
